EmailTemplate.description: Sending guidelines to buyer on how to complete the application online
EmailTemplate.name: 3a - SunPower Lease Qualification/Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Case# {!Case.CaseNumber}: SunPower Lease Credit Check Application for the Buyer - Lease# {!Case.Lease__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi All,
Please be advised that the Credit Check application has been requested and the link will be sent to the buyer's email within 24 hours at (buyer's email). Kindly verify that we have the correct email address.
Please check the junk or spam folders for this email which will come from: no-reply@credit.sunpowercorp.com.
Important Note: The online application has residency questions that require specific answers in order to avoid being automatically declined. Below are these residency questions plus some items to take note of when completing the online application.
1. Answer YES to the question pertaining to making this their Primary residence; 2. Answer 0 (zero) to the question pertaining to their length of stay in the property; 3. Please use the buyer's current home address and NOT the address of the property being bought. 4. N/A (not applicable) can be used when asked for the bank details as their full social will be used instead.
Should there be any concerns or queries, kindly use this email thread in order for us to locate the emails faster and respond accordingly.
Thank you!
{!Case.OwnerFullName} | Life Events
SunPower | PO Box 845759, Los Angeles, CA 90084-5759
